name: Alchembrew
startIntroPart1: Hello, Mr. President.  The people of the Republic of the Rising Star, the great Republic of Alchembrew, are looking to you to lead them through these trying times.
startIntroPart2: With the might of the Aether at your back, and your people to command, can you lead Alchembrew into prosperity?
declaringWar: You have crossed us one too many times. Prepare for a war you cannot win.
attacked: You should not have attacked our great nation. Your army fighting our army is like bringing a knife to a gunfight. Prepare for defeat like you have never known,
defeated: We may have fallen, but the might of the Aether will still crush you!
introduction: Hello. I am President Zephyr Maelstrom, leader of Alchembrew, the mighty Republic of the Rising Star. What achievements do you have to your name, and what land do you call your own?
neutralHello: Hello. What would you like to speak about?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We offer you this trade, looking to help both of our nations.
